    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String userId,
                    boolean userRestriction,
                    double userPreference)
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        addUser function adds a user to the DB
        Parameters:
        userId - User id passed to function to identify the user
        userRestriction - The user's restriction (disabled or not)
        userPreference - The user's prefered route (with regards to the length)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown exception in case the user can not be added

      • getPreference

        public java.lang.String getPreference(java.lang.String userId)
        This method will return the preferences for a user.
        Parameters:
        userId - This is the Unique ID for the user.
        Returns:
        A string representing the user's preferences.

      • getRestrictions

        public java.lang.String getRestrictions(java.lang.String userId)
        This method will return the restrictions for a User.
        Parameters:
        userId - This is the Unique ID for the user.
        Returns:
        A string representing the user's preferences.

      • getUser

        public java.lang.String getUser(java.lang.String userId)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        getUser function to get the user from the SQL DB.
        Parameters:
        userId - The passed user ID to search from the DB
        Returns:
        This is a string representing the user .
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown exception in case no user can be obtained

      • updatePreference

        public void updatePreference(java.lang.String userId,
                             double userPreference)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        updatePreference function to update the already existing user's preference
        Parameters:
        userId - The user's ID to update
        userPreference - The preference associated to the user's ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown exception in case no update can be made
